Posts.Content: My IDC was grade 3 and I didn't have chemo.  I had no spread to nodes, oestrogen +, HER2 -   Sample was sent for ONCO DX test which came back low, so no chemo.  Had 14 RT plus 5 boosters and have to take Anastrozole for 5 years.
Posts.Title: Diagnosed with grade 3 invasive ductal breast cancer, should I expect...
